title.narrative: MDG-F-2067 Harnessing Sustainable Linkages for SMEs in Turkey's Textile Sector

description.narrative: MDG-F - 2067: Harnessing Sustainable Linkages for SMEs in Turkey’s Textile Sector • Programme Duration: 30 Months • Anticipated start/end dates: 1 May 2010 to 30 October 2012 • Total estimated budget: 2,698,477.50 USD • Allocation of funded budget per agency: • UNDP: 1,428,922.50 USD • UNIDO: 858,675.00 USD • ILO: 410,880.00 USD Joint Programme Outcomes: 1. Productivity and innovation capacities of the SMEs in the Turkish textile industry especially in poor and vulnerable areas strengthened through enhanced collaboration and networking for increased competitiveness. 2. Sustainable development, CSR principles and gender equality are integrated into the business processes and practices of the Turkish SMEs in textile sector for increased competitiveness.

transaction.ref: TUR/10/50/UND-2012-TUR826 - Strengthened capacity of member States to ratify and apply international labour standards and to fulfil their reporting obligations-C
